articles.title: Art Performances Given in Honor of Guests
articles.content:
IOC Member Here 
   Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Zhang Ung, member of the International Olympic Committee who is president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation, arrived today to participate in the event for the torch relay of the 29th  Olympic Games slated to take place in Pyongyang.
